alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Lorain; Medina; Portage; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 6:59PM EDT until July 20 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Portage County in northeastern Ohio... Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Medina County in northeastern Ohio... Cuyahoga County in northeastern Ohio... Lake County in northeastern Ohio... Summit County in northeastern Ohio... Lorain County in north central Ohio... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 659 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Burton to Parma to near Vermilion, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Lorain, Elyria, Medina, Painesville, Willowick, Ravenna, Vermilion, Chardon, Fairport Harbor, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls, Euclid, Mentor, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick and Westlake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: This is an EXTREMELY DANGEROUS SITUATION. These storms are producing widespread wind damage. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows! Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Lorain; Medina; Portage; Summit
